cause.description:
This cause is simple: NO ID CARDS IN THE UK!
We don't need them, we don't want them.
It will cost 18 billion pounds to set up the system and another 5.4 billion a year after that to maintain the system.
David Blunkett himself said that they will not stop terrorism.
The existence of ID cards in Spain did not prevent the Madrid train bombings.
The existence of a single definitive identity register may make it easier for people to assume a false identity.
Join this cause to support your opposition to ID cards.
1. It won't stop terrorism.
2. Its an unfair tax on millions of families.
3. It will make fraud easier.
4. They will be forged anyway.
cause.mission: Stop compulsory ID cards in the UK!
cause.name: Stop ID cards in the UK!
